00055 class test_cb : public Perseus::callback {
00056 public:
00057   test_cb() {}
00058   test_cb(buffer<std::string>::sptr buf)
00059     : buffer_(buf) {}
00060   virtual ~test_cb() { }
00061   void operator()(unsigned char* data, size_t length) {
00062     using namespace boost::posix_time;
00063     std::string s((char*)(data), length);
00064     const ptime t(microsec_clock::universal_time());
00065     buffer_->insert(t, s);
00066   }
00067 protected:
00068 private:
00069   buffer<std::string>::sptr buffer_;
00070 } ;
00071 
00075 class bridge {
00076 public:
00077   bridge(buffer<std::string>::sptr buffer,
00078          network::broadcaster::broadcaster::sptr broadcaster,
00079          Perseus::receiver_control::sptr receiver)
00080     : buffer_(buffer)
00081     , broadcaster_(broadcaster)
00082     , strand_(broadcaster->get_strand())
00083     , receiver_(receiver)
00084     , do_run_(true)
00085     , mutex_(new boost::mutex)
00086     , cond_(new boost::condition) 
00087   {}
00088 
00089   ~bridge() {}
00090 
00091   void operator()() {
00092     while (do_run_) {
00093       try {
00094         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(*mutex_);
00095         data_= buffer_->get(); // this throws an exception if the buffer is stopped
00096         strand_.dispatch(strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&bridge::broadcast_data, this)));
00097 //         strand_.post(strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&bridge::broadcast_data, this)));
00098         do_run_ = !strand_.get_io_service().stopped();
00099         if (do_run_)
00100           cond_->wait(lock);
00101       } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00102         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("bridge::operator() stopped '%s'") % e.what()));
00103         do_run_= false;
00104       }
00105     }
00106     // finish
00107   }
00108 protected:
00109   void broadcast_data() {
00110     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(*mutex_);
00111     // make up data packet
00112     const network::protocol::iq_info
00113       header_iq(receiver_->get_sample_rate(),
00114                 receiver_->get_center_frequency_hz(),
00115                 'I', 3, 0);
00116     const std::string stream_name("DataIQ");
00117     std::string d(sizeof(header_iq)+data_.second.size(), 0);
00118     std::copy(header_iq.begin(),    header_iq.end(),    d.begin());
00119     std::copy(data_.second.begin(), data_.second.end(), d.begin()+sizeof(header_iq));
00120     broadcaster_->bc_data(data_.first, stream_name, "IQ__0000", d);
00121     cond_->notify_one();
00122   }
00123 
00124 private:
00125   buffer<std::string>::sptr       buffer_;
00126   network::broadcaster::broadcaster::sptr broadcaster_;
00127   boost::asio::strand&            strand_;
00128   Perseus::receiver_control::sptr receiver_;
00129   bool                            do_run_;
00130   buffer<std::string>::ptime_data_pair data_;   // current to be broadcaster data
00131   boost::shared_ptr<boost::mutex>      mutex_;  // mutex
00132   boost::shared_ptr<boost::condition>  cond_;   // condition used to signal new data
00133 } ;
00134 
00136 void unexpected_handler() {
00137   std::cerr << "unexpected called; uncaught_exception=" << std::uncaught_exception() << std::endl;
00138   throw std::runtime_error("unexpected called");
00139 }
00141 void terminate_handler() {
00142   std::cerr << "terminate handler called uncaught_exception=" << std::uncaught_exception() << std::endl;
00143   abort();
00144 }
00145 
00146 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00147 { 
00148   std::set_unexpected(unexpected_handler);
00149   std::set_terminate(terminate_handler);
00150 
00151   // process command-line arguments
00152   boost::program_options::variables_map vm;
00153   try {
00154     vm = process_options("config/perseus_server.xml", argc, argv);
00155   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00156     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00157     return 1;
00158   }
00159 
00160   // inititalize @ref logger.hpp
00161   boost::filesystem::path p(vm["config"].as<std::string>());
00162   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", p.stem().native());
00163   try {
00164     // read XML configuration 
00165     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00166     read_xml(vm["config"].as<std::string>(), config, boost::property_tree::xml_parser::no_comments);
00167 
00168     // set up a usb session
00169     libusb::session::sptr s(libusb::session::get_global_session());
00170 
00171     const boost::property_tree::ptree& config_perseus(config.get_child("Perseus"));
00172     const std::string perseus_firmware(config_perseus.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.firmware"));
00173 
00174     // get the number of connected perseus SDRs
00175     const size_t num_perseus(Perseus::receiver_control::get_num_perseus());
00176     std::cout << "found " << num_perseus << std::endl;
00177 
00178     if (num_perseus == 0)
00179       throw std::runtime_error("no perseus receiver found");    
00180 
00181     // find the right perseus SDR
00182     int index(-1);
00183     for (size_t i(0); i<num_perseus; ++i) {
00184       const Perseus::product_id pid(Perseus::receiver_control::get_product_id_at(i, perseus_firmware));
00185       std::cout << str(boost::format("index=%2d: %s") % i % pid.to_str()) << std::endl;
00186       if (pid.sn() == config_perseus.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.sn", 0))
00187         index = i;
00188     }
00189 
00190     if (index != -1) {
00191       std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> > threads;
00192       network::broadcaster::broadcaster::sptr bc;
00193       buffer<std::string>::sptr buf;
00194       Perseus::receiver_control::sptr rec;
00195       {
00196         // wait until a signal is sent/service is stopped
00197         wait_for_signal w(network::get_io_service());
00198         w.add_signal(SIGINT).add_signal(SIGQUIT).add_signal(SIGTERM);        
00199 
00200         const boost::property_tree::ptree& config_broadcaster(config_perseus.get_child("Broadcaster"));
00201         bc = network::broadcaster::broadcaster::make(config_broadcaster);
00202 
00203         bc->start();
00204 
00205         // buffer between perseus and broadcaster
00206         buf = buffer<std::string>::make_buffer(1024*1000, boost::posix_time::seconds(1));
00207 
00208         // set up the receiver
00209         Perseus::callback::sptr cb(new test_cb(buf));
00210         rec = Perseus::receiver_control::make(index);
00211         rec->init(config_perseus);
00212 
00213         // thread pool setup
00214         const size_t thread_pool_size(config_broadcaster.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.threadPoolSize"));
00215         for (std::size_t i(0); i<thread_pool_size; ++i) {
00216           boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> thread
00217             (new boost::thread(boost::bind(&boost::asio::io_service::run, &network::get_io_service())));
00218           threads.push_back(thread);
00219         }
00220 
00221         // bridge running in a thread
00222         {
00223           bridge r(buf, bc, rec);
00224           boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> bridge_thread(new boost::thread(r));
00225           threads.push_back(bridge_thread);
00226         }
00227 
00228         // start receiver callback
00229         rec->start_async_input(cb);
00230         
00231       } // here the destructor of wait_for_signal waits for a signal
00232 
00233       rec->stop_async_input();
00234       buf->stop();
00235       bc->stop();
00236       usleep(1000*1000);
00237       network::get_io_service().stop();
00238 
00239       // Wait for all threads in the pool to exit.
00240       BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> thr, threads)
00241         thr->join();
00242       
00243       std::cout << "**** stopped *** " << std::endl;
00244     }
00245   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00246     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00247     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00248     return 1;
00249   }
00250   return 0;
00251 }
